item.title: test
item.description: {{ partial “about.html” . }} Testing to see if this new page appears anywhere. Okay, it does. Excellent. Now how do I remove the date and tags? Not by removing it from the YAML! For Markdown syntax: https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet Can I do line breaks just with enter? Kind of. But it didn’t add the extras. Twitter link Links work using html, so maybe linebreaks will too. Add some words after the break.
